description: This file is a shell script designed to configure network interfaces, start and stop hostapd (for Wi-Fi access point management), modify network configurations, and manage related services such as dnsmasq and lighttpd on a network device. It appears to be part of the setup or control scripts for a network bridge and access points in a router or similar device.

methods.name: Restart_Hostapd
methods.description: Restarts the hostapd service and configures WLAN interfaces.
